value.name: WATCH: Gardena, California, Police Officers Fatally Shoot Unarmed Man
value.description: police officers fatally shooting an unarmed man in 2013. Ricardo Diaz-Zeferino was killed when officers, who say he didn’t obey officers orders to stay still with his hands in the air ...

value.name: News outlets seek videos of killing of unarmed man by police
value.description: The videos, which are under a federal court seal, show 34-year-old Ricardo Diaz Zeferino being shot by Gardena police officers in 2013. His family and another man who was wounded filed a federal ...
